insight:
Anomaly Detected: 101 unauthorized discounts exceeding 15% were found across various locations. Examples include S006 (47.05%), S020 (41.94%), S021 (21.38%, 22.25%), and S024 (39.27%).
Reason: These discounts are unauthorized as they surpass the allowed thresholds.
Immediate Action (SOP-FIN-003, Section: Pricing and Discount Policy): Unauthorized discounts >15% require Regional Director approval and trigger a financial audit.
